betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§oIn this lightweight modpack, we essentially included enough QoL to fit your needs, and it is perfectly playable as is. But maybe you require more?§r

If you're playing singleplayer, feel free to add mods to your instance. For more QoL, more Tech, maybe Magic...?
Just be sure to not add anything that breaks progression... promise?


Since we're part of the §2GregTech: CEu§r community, I will plug some of the §9addons§r here that you can safely add to your instance (running list):

§9-§r §dGregTech Food Option§r §6(released)§r adds various food chains and machines, to make... food! Making Bread won't be too easy, and will require some lovely automation. A nice alternate challenge.
